DataElement.preferredName: Translational Research Tissue Specimen Obtain Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to eligibility determinations related to obtaining tissue specimens for studies designed to translate basic science findings into clinically useful tools and applications.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to obtaining tissue specimens for studies designed to translate basic science findings into clinically useful tools and applications.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Studies designed to translate basic science findings into clinically useful tools and applications.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: Studies designed to translate basic science findings into clinically useful tools and applications and to ensure that new treatments and research knowledge reach the patients or populations for whom they are intended and are implemented correctly.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: To come into possession of something. (Concept includes term form "Obtained")

Concepts.definition: To come into possession of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to eligibility determinations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Phase II patients: A mandator
ReferenceDocuments.description: Phase II patients: A mandatory translational research component for tissue (slides or blocks) is part of this study; the patient will be automatically registered onto this component (Sections 3.29d and 17.4).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: A mandatory correlative research component is part of this study, the patient will be automatically registered onto this component

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: A mandatory translational research component for tissue is part of this study. The patient will be automatically registered onto this component

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: A mandatory correlative research component is part of this study and the patient will be automatically registered onto this component

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: A mandatory correlative research component is part of this study for all patients

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: A mandatory correlative research component for tissue (slides or blocks) is part of this study; the patient will be automatically registered onto this component
